item.description:
Making Herbal Medicine - The plant world has alot to offer us in terms of nutrition and supporting our health. This topic was ranked high in our "Polls" area as a topic of interest so this month we will be looking at...

.:Growing/Sourcing medicinal plants
.:Turning them into medicine (tinctures, teas, oils, salves) with one of these as a "hands-on" exercise
.:Resources for learning how to use medicinal plants in a safe way

There are so many plants to consider - so we will focus on some that can help strengthen our immune systems through the winter. Handouts provided. Lisa will be drawing on her >15 years of study in this area, but bring along all your own expertise and questions! We all have great information to share.

Potluck at 6:30 as always!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Portland Maine Permaculture January Meetup
